summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 GMC ENVOY.  HE STATED THAT THE PASSENGER SIDE SEAT BELTS WOULD NOT RETRACT.  THE DEALER STATED THAT A DEFECTIVE RETRACTOR COULD HAVE CAUSED THE FAILURE HOWEVER; THEY DID NOT INSPECT THE VEHICLE.  THERE IS A RECALL FOR THE SEAT BELTS (NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID #04V201000) HOWEVER; THE DEALER STATED THAT HIS VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED.  AS OF JUNE 24, 2008, THE DEALER HAD NOT REPAIRED THE VEHICLE.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 80,000.
